scripts.uglify: mkdirp assets/js && uglifyjs src/assets/js/*.js -o assets/js/custom.js -m --source-map && uglifyjs src/assets/js/*.js -o assets/js/custom.min.js -m -c
scripts.postsass: postcss assets/css/style.css -u autoprefixer --no-map -o ./style.css && postcss assets/css/*.css --map --use autoprefixer --use cssnano --replace
scripts.svgo: mkdirp assets/images/icons && svgo -f src/assets/images -o assets/images && svgo -f src/assets/images/icons -o assets/images/icons
scripts.build:css: npm run lintscss -s && npm run sass -s
scripts.build:js: npm run lintjs -s && npm run uglify -s
scripts.test: npm run phpcs -s && npm run lintjs -s && npm run lintscss -s
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run phpcs
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:images
